name: Up the River
description:
Improved version of my GMTK2018 submission. This prototype is an hybrid between a race game and a rhythm game : you have to row your boat to move and keeping the same rythm (with a bit of tolerance to accelerate/decelerate a bit) allows you to row faster.

There is a bug where the game might freeze at the start when using Google Chrome.

Controls: 

  • You can row using the keys AD, QD, the arrow keys or R1,L1 on a controller. 
  • To pause, press the Escape key or Start on a controller.
  • To restart, press the R key or Select on a controller.
